name: Fyatracker.GitHub.io
body: This organization is currently in the development phase.  There is a message board, and we can chat on FireTalk (Mesh Networking IM Client - compatible with iPhone, Android, and Windows phone.  I'm not sure if there is a web version, but issues like that will be addressed as I develop the site.  Please contact me with questions/concerns/methods of encryption and communication safety.  Never be afraid of asking for help.  I would prefer to give telephone support @ 0300 in the morning if it means plugging any possible security leaks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
